mapper.select: SELECT cea.csat_seq,cea.exam_seq,cea.section_seq,cea.subject_seq,cea.avg, cea.standard_deviation,ces.subject_name FROM csat_exam_avg cea LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM csat_exam_subject WHERE csat_seq = #{csatSequence} AND exam_seq = #{examSequence}) ces ON ( ces.csat_seq = cea.csat_seq AND ces.exam_seq = cea.exam_seq AND ces.section_seq = cea.section_seq AND ces.subject_seq = cea.subject_seq ) WHERE cea.csat_seq = #{csatSequence} AND cea.exam_seq = #{examSequence}
